fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the day, choose another player to jail.
- Execute your target at night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When you jail a player, for the duration of the next night, they will be placed in a private chat with you. Messages sent by you will appear to have been sent by “Jailor”, and your target will additionally be unable to communicate in any private chats they may have for the night.
- While jailed, targets are roleblocked through immunities, gain Powerful defense, and all other abilities used against them will fail. Indirect effects may still apply.
- You may only execute thrice. You suffer no punishments for executing a Townie.
- You automatically execute non-Town players you jail. You may choose not to, though. Also, you have the option to manually execute in case you really fucking hate someone.
